bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon main frame, seatstay & chainstay, Net Molded tapered head tube, BB90 w/Precision Fit Sockets, E2 tapered head tube, internal control routing, no-cut off-road seatmast, ABP Race, Full Floater, magnesium EVO Link, replaceable derailleur hanger, 100mm travel

components.description: Cane Creek IS-3, E2, alloy cartridge
Trek fork & shock sag meter, Bontrager shock pump
